summary: After Marnie Watson kills her abusive husband in self-defense, she is condemned to house arrest... only to discover that the house is possessed by the enraged and violent spirit of her dead husband.
cast: Famke Janssen|Bobby Cannavale|Ed Westwick|Michael Paré|Patricia Charbonneau|John Fallon|Kevin Geer|Tibor Pálffy|Kembe Sorel|Evelyne Kandech|Ken Kelsch|Jonathan Sanger|Eric Walkuski
title: Arresto domiciliario
